main event: An unidentified flying object was observed in Longmont, Colorado on July 6, 1957, lasting for about 90 seconds.
interesting points: The object was described as round and luminous, hovering silently about 200 yards from a witness's home., The object had no visible means of propulsion and was estimated to be 30 to 40 feet in diameter., The witness reported a bright light outside her bedroom window prior to the sighting., The object suddenly darted upwards at a high speed and disappeared from sight., This sighting was considered credible by investigators.
